snippet: The House Judiciary Committee mulls provisions of the SAFE Act, which would criminalize many illegal immigrants.
abstract: Immigration Divide column; as Senate prepares to debate path to citizenship for more than 11 million immigrants in the country illegally, House Judiciary Committee argues in nuances of legislation that would turn millions of those immigrants into criminals overnight.
lead_paragraph: The House Judiciary Committee mulls provisions of the SAFE Act, which would criminalize many illegal immigrants.
